name: Thorpe Park
description: Thorpe Park is a theme park located in Surrey, England. It is known for its thrilling rides and attractions, including roller coasters, water rides, and live entertainment.

name: Parc Astérix
description: Parc Astérix is a theme park located in Plailly, France. It is based on the stories of Asterix and Obelix, featuring attractions and shows inspired by the comic book series.

name: Europa-Park
description: Europa-Park is the largest theme park in Germany and one of the most popular in Europe. It features a variety of themed areas, rides, and attractions based on different European countries.

name: Poulton's Park
description: Poulton's Park is a family theme park located in Hampshire, England. It features a variety of rides and attractions suitable for all ages, including roller coasters, water rides, and themed areas.

name: Chessington World of Adventures
description: Chessington World of Adventures is a theme park and zoo located in Surrey, England. It features a variety of rides, attractions, and animal exhibits, making it a popular destination for families.

name: Blackpool Pleasure Beach
description: Blackpool Pleasure Beach is a famous amusement park located in Blackpool, England. It is known for its iconic roller coasters, family rides, and entertainment shows.

name: PortAventura World
description: PortAventura World is a large theme park located in Salou, Spain. It features a variety of themed areas, rides, and attractions, including roller coasters and water rides.

name: Plopsaland De Panne
description: Plopsaland De Panne is a family theme park located in De Panne, Belgium. It features a variety of rides and attractions based on popular children's characters and TV shows.

name: Ferrari Land
description: Ferrari Land is a theme park located in Salou, Spain, dedicated to the Ferrari brand. It features attractions and rides inspired by Ferrari's history and racing heritage.

name: Futuroscope
description: Futuroscope is a theme park located in Poitiers, France, known for its futuristic attractions and multimedia experiences. It features a variety of rides, shows, and exhibitions that explore technology and innovation.

name: Phantasialand
description: Phantasialand is a theme park located in Brühl, Germany. It features a variety of themed areas, rides, and attractions, including roller coasters, water rides, and live shows.

name: Toverland
description: Toverland is a theme park located in Sevenum, Netherlands. It features a variety of indoor and outdoor attractions, including roller coasters, water rides, and themed areas.

name: Walibi Belgium
description: Walibi Belgium is a theme park located in Wavre, Belgium. It features a variety of rides and attractions, including roller coasters, water rides, and family-friendly attractions.

name: Walibi Holland
description: Walibi Holland is a theme park located in Biddinghuizen, Netherlands. It features a variety of rides and attractions, including roller coasters, water rides, and family-friendly attractions.
